statements: SELECT * FROM local_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, participant_name, participation_level FROM local_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM local_events WHERE participation_level = 'High';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM local_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, participant_name FROM local_events WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM local_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01'
SELECT event_name, event_date, participant_name, participation_level FROM local_events WHERE participant_id = 123 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_name, participant_name FROM local_events WHERE participation_level = 'High' AND event_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_id) AS total_events, COUNT(DISTINCT participant_id) AS total_participants FROM local_events
SELECT event_name, participant_name, participation_level FROM local_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND participant_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY participant_id, event_date
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, attendees FROM Events WHERE attendees > 50 ORDER BY attendees DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE participant_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM Participants ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Events JOIN Participants ON Events.event_id = Participants.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendees FROM Events WHERE attendees > 50 ORDER BY event_date LIMIT 3;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, event_name FROM Participants JOIN Events ON Participants.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE Participants.registration_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT participation_id, participation_status FROM participation WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT attendee_name, event_name FROM attendees INNER JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM participation WHERE participation_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM event_attendance
SELECT user_id, attendance_date FROM event_attendance ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York'
SELECT participation_level FROM event_participation WHERE event_id = 5
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, e.event_name, ea.attendance_date FROM users u JOIN event_attendance ea ON u.user_id = ea.user_id JOIN events e ON ea.event_id = e.event_id WHERE e.event_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT e.event_name, COUNT(ep.user_id) AS participants_count FROM events e LEFT JOIN event_participation ep ON e.event_id = ep.event_id GROUP BY e.event_name;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ea.event_id) AS attendance_count FROM users u JOIN event_attendance ea ON u.user_id = ea.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(ea.event_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, attendance_status FROM events INNER JOIN event_attendance ON events.event_id = event_attendance.event_id;
SELECT event_name, level_name, engagement_score FROM events INNER JOIN event_engagement ON events.event_id = event_engagement.event_id WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendees FROM events JOIN event_attendance ON events.event_id = event_attendance.event_id GROUP BY event_name;

SELECT attendees.attendee_name, events.event_name, engagement_levels.level_name FROM attendees JOIN event_attendance ON attendees.attendee_id = event_attendance.attendee_id JOIN events ON event_attendance.event_id = events.event_id JOIN event_engagement ON events.event_id = event_engagement.event_id JOIN engagement_levels ON event_engagement.level_id = engagement_levels.level_id;
SELECT event_name, engagement_score FROM events JOIN event_engagement ON events.event_id = event_engagement.event_id WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
